title: SurgBox: Agent-Driven Operating Room Sandbox with Surgery Copilot
summary: Surgical interventions, particularly in neurology, represent complex and high-stakes scenarios that impose substantial cognitive burdens on surgical teams. Although deliberate education and practice can enhance cognitive capabilities, surgical training opportunities remain limited due to patient safety concerns.
